    Interstroke Proportion Figure

    is_figure_proportion.Rd

    Interstroke Proportion Figure

    Usage

    is_figure_proportion(
  interstroke_data,
  x_axis_variable,
  proportion_variable,
  dropped_prop_levels = NULL,
  na_rm = FALSE,
  text_size = NULL
)

    Arguments

    interstroke_data

    Project specific Interstroke dataset.

    x_axis_variable

    A categorical variable that will be placed on the x-axis of the proportion figure.

    proportion_variable

    The predictor variable.

    dropped_prop_levels

    **optional** Named proportion levels to be excluded. Default includes all predictor levels. Format = c("x", "y", "z")

    na_rm

    **optional** A logical scalar. Should NA values be removed?. Default is FALSE.

    text_size

    **Optional** Assign value for text size.

    Value

    An Interstroke proportion ggplot figure

    Examples

    is_figure_proportion(interstroke_bmi, regionnn7, bmi_3_level)
#> Error in select(., !!x_axis_variable_quo, case, !!proportion_variable_quo): object 'interstroke_bmi' not found
is_figure_proportion(interstroke_proxy, regionnn7, highwhr)
#> Error in select(., !!x_axis_variable_quo, case, !!proportion_variable_quo): object 'interstroke_proxy' not found
is_figure_proportion(interstroke_proxy, regionnn7, highwhr, dropped_prop_levels = c("Low", "Moderate"), na_rm = TRUE)
#> Error in tidyr::drop_na(., !!proportion_variable_quo): object 'interstroke_proxy' not found
